name: Barbarian
description: A barbarian is a fierce warrior known for their brute strength and ferocity.

name: Paladin
description: A paladin is a holy knight who fights for justice and righteousness.

name: Ranger
description: A ranger is a skilled archer and tracker, adept at surviving in the wild.

name: Mage
description: A mage is a master of elemental magic, capable of casting powerful spells.
